p: The antimalarial efficiency of screening against P. falciparum Dd2 and 7G8 (CQR) strains of the MeOH extract of stems of C. batesii and compounds 2, 3, 5 and 6 was performed according to the Sybr Green I fluorescence-based assays [ 46]. The results are presented in Fig.Â 3; they indicate the IC 50 of extract of stems of C. batesii and the percentage of growth inhibition against Dd2 and 7G8 P. falciparum strains respectively.
